review: I bought a Fire stick and it was lousy.  Constantly buffering. I heard good things about the Fire TV since it has a larger memory, and the buffering problem is resolved.However, this comes with the same crappy remote.  The remote completely sucks.  You can't use it for navigating the keyboard menu to do searches, because pressing the left or right button even the teeniest, tiniest bit will cause the cursor to fly ten or twenty spaces.  This also happens when trying to scroll through my cued list of movies.And no, it is not the batteries.  I replaced them.  It's the remote.  It sucks, plain and simple.
